topic.title: Paradisus-Paradoxum feat. Myulee (ミュリ) [ dj-Jo Remix ] Extended Version
topic.body:
Link to dj-Jo's YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGKlNzrejpOrTh5a5I12i6A

"Art from the Anime Re:Zero

Vocals by Myulee ミュリ
https://twitter.com/Myulee22
http://www.nicovideo.jp/mylist/39054340

Original song from the 2nd opening to TV Anime "Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu" by MYTH&ROID

---
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/djjomusic
Support my Patreon for high quality mp3 downloads and uncompressed instrumentals!
---
First off, I have to say that Myulee is incredible!! She has an amazing voice but hasn't gotten much recognition. Please check out more of her other covers, she will not leave you disappointed! She is a Korean utaite and has an amazing range. (:

Myulee: "It was an honor to join this collaboration(っ´ω`c)
I hope you enjoy the song♪♬♫"

For the Anime (Re:Zero), I love how much of a change of mood this opening really brings to the Anime. MYTH&ROID have been on a roll lately and they are really showing us how flexible and epic they can be!

For the remix, I decided to go with a Glitch Hop Trap mix (Trap Hop haha) and I really had a ton of fun coming up with drop ideas. I tried to go out of my box and make a different kind of drop for you guys. I hope you'll like it xD I usually don't really like these kind of drops myself but after experiencing a lot of EDM shows, I have a new respect for the kind of drop that builds up so much and just drops the bass with a simpler melody line instead of an explosion of sound that I've grown to love.

All in all, it's been a bit since my last upload because I've been preparing for some shows (Anime Festival Orlando, and San Japan). My AFO show was beyond fun and I had the time of my life meeting new people and hang out with some old friends! I can't wait to go to Texas for the first time at San Japan! See you guys then!

For now, I leave you with this extended remix from one of the best shows this year!

See you next time!

___

Download: https://soundcloud.com/dj-jomusicchannel/paradisus-paradoxum-feat-myulee-dj-jo-remix-extended-version
